gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: North Atlantic Ocean - Temperature and salinity observation collection V2

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString:
SeaDataNet Temperature and Salinity historical data collection v2, including revised quality flags after quality control with ODV.
For data access please register at http://www.marine-id.org

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: SeaDataNet Usage Agreement: If you use SeaDataNet data in your publications please include the following in the Acknowledgements: Data were provided through SeaDataNet Pan-European infrastructure for ocean and marine data management (https://www.seadatanet.org)

gmd:otherConstraints.gco:CharacterString: No limitations on public access. For data access please register at http://www.marine-id.org
